name: Button Breaker (StayToasty)
description:
-BUTTON BREAKER-

Can you get the highscore? Dont hit the wrong button!

3 different gamemodes, Check your stats and buy themes in the shop. Have Fun!

How To Play: Arcade: 

Survive and loop through all the phases! The game is over when you press the wrong button or miss the window of that phase. Each phase has different timing for "time to press" and "spawning" so be careful what button you press! 

Rush:

You have 30 Seconds, gets through as many buttons as possible! Hit the wrong button, game over

Turbo:

The buttons will drift in from the left hand side of the screen, press the button that appeared first. Like always, gg's if you press that wrong button!

Seeking (Unpaid):

I'm looking for someone to possibly add some new music to the game. Music isnt my forte.. if you have any exisiting music or can whip somthing up, contact me:

staytoastygames@gmail.com
